fields.headline: Pick of the week: Jazz
fields.bodyText: Courtney Pine Band/The Passion Hull Truck Theatre Saturday 2 UK sax legend Pine is one of the most inventive global jazz explorers; singing trio The Passion includes multi award-winner Liane Carroll. Jazz Jamaica Hull Truck Theatre Sunday 3 One of the most popular bands on the scene, Jazz Jamaica give Motown classics a reggae pulse, and blast full-on jazz improv through the middle. Stuart McCallum Matt And Phred's, Manchester Wednesday 6 Excellent young Cinematic Orchestra guitarist of deep jazz knowledge, originality with loops and effects. Jamil Sheriff Grey Horse, Huddersfield Wednesday 6 Powerful northern-based band featuring the punchy postbop composing of pianist Sheriff, now enhanced with new material for the group's second album.
